channel.title: KodakScape // JOIN NOW // AllSTAR // 24/7// VPS HOSTED // WEBCLIENT // Bosses
channel.description:
[center][b]Welcome to my thread, kodakscape actually haha![/b][/center] [center]I've recently opened my RSPS, starting to look for new comers! If you wanting to join the KodakScape community then, all the information will below! I'll have the downloadable client on my forums. Again this will be listed below. THIS IS A ALLSTAR SOURCE![/center]
[center][b]Information About Server:[/b][/center] [center]The server is 24/7 unless somehow my VPS doesn't cooperate right. This is an Allstar-based server. I ripped the code from FutureScape V1, thanks for I c E m A n for releasing the source. It's very stable and completely customized. There are no custom items etc. The only thing custom is my client. Pictures will be uploaded here as well.[/center] [center][size=24pt][b]There will be a Double XP Weekend this week! :)[/b][/size][/center]
[b][u]Updated:[/u][/b][/size] - Double Xp Ring (donator Only) - Fixed Cooking - Fix some minor bugs - Shops fixes - 1B Token Shop added - Backup Button added - HelpMe Button added - Added Slash Boss - Add Rock-shell Bonuses - Added [Quick Chat] for skills - Added dicing - Added dicing glowing effect - Added more options to ::rewardlist - Added Penguin Ring (Donators ATM) - Fixed Fletching - Fixed Dupes - Added Donator Status - New Home - Added Working GSMINI - ADDED Donator Zone - Clickable buyable food in quest tab - Added Skills2 (extended from ::skills) - BackUP - to back up ur file - More Quest tab commands - Change text colors - DOUBLE XP Events - Random Amount of Coins from stalls - Stopped Auto Clickers - Updated Players List - 100% Mining
[size=10pt][u][b]Under Construction:[/b][/u][/size] - New bosses - adding donator crown - Penguin Ring publicly released - More Teleports - Vote direct - Automatic donation - Prayer (SoulSplit) - Crystal shield half damage - Fixing Fletching 10% done
[center][b]Links[/b][/center] [center]Webclient - [url=http://kodakscapeforums.createaforum.com/index.php?action=ezportal;sa=page;p=1]http://kodakscapeforums.createaforum.com/index.php?action=ezportal;sa=page;p=1[/url][/center]
[center][b]Client Link:[/b] http://up.ht/1a9fJ8c[/center] [center][b]Forums:[/b] http://kodakscapeforums.createaforum.com/index.php[/center]
[center][b]Pictures:[/b][/center] [center][size=18pt]CUSTOMS FOR SALE[/size]:[/center] [center][IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/30u304h.png[/img][/center] [center][IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/np44df.png[/img][/center] [center][IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/30hsx8k.png[/img][/center] [center][IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/345zjfl.png[/img][/center] [center][IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/2mfwubm.png[/img][/center] [center][IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/11hc4ud.png[/img][/center] [center][IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/mjpbg7.png[/img][/center] [center][IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/3498ec7.png[/img][/center] [center][IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/wu022o.png[/img][/center] Donator Armor: [center][IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2ce5ev5.png[/img][/center] Double Xp Notification: [center][IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2pyb5na.png[/img][/center] [center][IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/aujo6h.png[/img][/center] [center][IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2njagw3.png[/img][/center] [center][IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2mdo17m.png[/img][/center] [center][IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/ot3qk2.png[/img][/center] [center][IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2yknk8n.png[/img][/center] [center][IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2qa4qk6.png[/img][/center] Veng: [center][IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/1568nk6.png[/img][/center]
[center]Hopefully you liked it :P. I also hope you join and get a chance to hang with the community. Thanks again for taking a look, and hope to see you soon! Have a wonderful day![/center]
[center]~ [b]Jake[/b][/center]

item.title: KodakScape // JOIN NOW // AllSTAR // 24/7// VPS HOSTED // WEBCLIENT // Bosses
item.dc:creator: @shadowtoon shadowtoon
item.description:
@shadowtoon wrote:

zj4k:

There are no custom items etc. The only thing custom is my client. Pictures will be uploaded here as well.[/center]

Not to trash talk about it, but you just told lies there buddy, we can clearly see it in your screenshots that you have customs, you even mention it in them.
Please update your info. I won’t be joining though but good luck.

Read full topic

item.title: KodakScape // JOIN NOW // AllSTAR // 24/7// VPS HOSTED // WEBCLIENT // Bosses
item.dc:creator: @digimajor digimajor
item.description:
@digimajor wrote:

well , the server looks a lot the same like Futurescape … maybe you should bring your own ideas?
put a allstar server online which one hasnt and isnt be a lookalike of FS . ill respect you want players to play a server what has run very good , but give all the credits on Futurescape and the owner Ice . Sorry .
If you want to hit me up for a talk just send me a PM .

yours ,

Owner and Coder of Allstarmontana , Digimajor .

Read full topic

item.title: KodakScape // JOIN NOW // AllSTAR // 24/7// VPS HOSTED // WEBCLIENT // Bosses
item.dc:creator: @Revamp_dis_Shit Revamp dis Shit
item.description:
@Revamp_dis_Shit wrote:

[quote=“matzie, post:22, topic:539660”]A server run off of a home computer with donations. This to me says money hungry scrub. Not to mention it is a PI source, main reason I liked Allstar was because it wasn’t a PI. good look in your money swallowing endeavors. 0/10
A good server allows for ways to get all items without having to pay for them. Paying for the ability to get them more frequently - that is another story.[/quote]
It’s not a PI Matzie, you must be high.

Read full topic
